name: MyRestaurant
description:
Take care of your restaurant to get more money.

How to play?

Click on the broom (on the bottom of it) to hold it and press the Q button to release it.

If the soda box is empty on the broom side, if you have more than 9 money, fill the machine with soda again.

Use the broom to clean the dirt on the floor by clicking on it with the broom in your hand.

Take the old book from the child's room and throw it away by clicking on it and clicking on the trash.

The game is still in alpha and has several bugs, lack of logic and etc. Help evaluating the game. :3
